name: The withered sceptre of the Four Horsemen (1h)
data: It has awesome weapon class for its type (low in general).
It increases the users intelligence phenomenally.
It increases the users spellpoint regeneration adequately.
It increases the users hitpoint regeneration poorly.
This item loses its magical powers incredibly slowly.
The sceptre can 'deploy' a headless horseman to do the wielder's bidding.
The sceptre shrivels the wielder's adversaries with withering rays.
The weapon does more non-physical damage than expected.
